input.sentences: exploring graffiti around the city and found these lights that almost look like demon eyes
a very distrubing image on the side of an apartment building we found
the entrance to a basement that was just covered .
the same shot with some camera effects added
this is n't graffiti but the stairs form their own art work
output.sentences: Dark and gloom had descended upon the city.
Even the faces on the buildings seemed to be crying out in agony.
The aliens tried to decipher the graffiti on the buildings as though it was a local language.
The empty streets echoed the devastation that had taken place.
The city once so alive with life and hope now stood empty and silent.
